archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Opstellen Behandelplan (bp)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: <languages xml:space="preserve"><nl-NL>Pre-conditie: (voorlopig/werk) diagnose is gesteld Post-conditie: het behandelplan is opgesteld en activiteiten en resources zijn ingepland.</nl-NL><en-US>Pre-condition: (preliminary/work) diagnosis has been made Post-condition: the treatment plan has been drawn up and activities and resources have been planned.</en-US></languages>

properties.value: Pre-conditie: (voorlopig/werk) diagnose is gesteld Post-conditie: het behandelplan is opgesteld en activiteiten en resources zijn ingepland.
Pre-condition: (preliminary/work) diagnosis has been made Post-condition: the treatment plan has been drawn up and activities and resources have been planned.
